name: Hags Castle (itch)
description:
Hags Castle takes place in a Scottish fantasy world, with monsters that are loosely based on ancient Celtic myths and legends.

The main antagonist, ‘Madame Hag’, has taken over the island stronghold and turned all the local bog creatures into her personal vanguard. You, as ‘Wizard Greypoo’s lackey’, have been asked to perform the quest of rescuing his baby dragon ‘Oli’, (The Oillipheist ), who has unique skills which can be put to good use...
